rule.description: Ungafaka isethingi le ngemenyu yokuchofoza ngesidleni kiyo nanyana ngiliphi ikhasi lewebhu, i-URL yekhasi lewebhu izokufakwa njengomthetho ngokuzenzakalelayo Ungahlela imithetho ekhona. .

glob.title: Indlela ye-glob isebenzisa ilayibrari ye-{{1}} Sibawa bona malungana nokusetjenziswa, nofana ungafuna ukusetjenziswa kwe-{{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, ehambelana nekhasi lokuthoma le-YouTube nawo woke amakhasi angaphasi.

regexp.title: Inkulumo ejayelekileko, sibawa ubone Qala malungana nokusetjenziswa.
